lines: Kolanga Jesu takwe cibi, Tata ndizuzye bumi bwakwe,
Ndili mubisyi ndisandule, Kondisalazya ndi tube bu.
Kondisalazya nditube bu, Koba a andime ndikuzyibe,
Ndili mubisyi ndisandule, Kondisalazya nditube bu.
Bubisyi bwangu bwavulisya ndilayowa ku Ôlanga kwako,
Kobola Jesu unditole, Ndizwe muzibi zya munyika.
Bubotu bwakwe ndilayanda kusalala kwako O Jesu,
Mwami ndalomba konditubya, Ndisame musyini wa buumi.
Wakandi fwida akundivuna, Ndili mubisyi wanditubya,
Ndiyiye majwi ako Mwami, Nditembaule Zina lyako.
